title: Cavaliers' Iman Shumpert needs wrist surgery, out 3 months
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun: NBA - Today 
Cleveland Cavaliers guard Iman Shumpert needs surgery on his right wrist and will be sidelined for at least three months. Shumpert injured h...
